card.name: Anje Falkenrath
card.text: Haste {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card. Whenever you discard a card, if it has madness, untap Anje Falkenrath.

card.name: Ghired's Belligerence
card.text: Ghired's Belligerence deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures. Whenever a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

card.name: Ghired, Conclave Exile
card.text: When Ghired, Conclave Exile enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample. Whenever Ghired attacks, populate. The token enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

card.name: Sevinne, the Chronoclasm
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Sevinne, the Chronoclasm. Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
